name: The cloak of dark powers
data: It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'soul manipulation'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'demon and devil lore'.
